about.title: Why Choose JKK?
about.description: PT. Jaya Karya Kontruksi is a trusted construction company engaged in General Contractor, Batching Plant, and Asphalt Mixing Plant services.

construction.title: General Contractor
construction.desc: Specialists in Highway, Bridge, Drainage, and Building construction with experienced experts.

infrastructure.title: Batching Plant
infrastructure.desc: High-quality ready mix concrete production with Dry Mix systems and complete Concrete Laboratory support.

energy.title: Asphalt Mixing Plant
energy.desc: Providing hotmix asphalt with modern equipment for precise road paving projects.

profile.title: Company Profile
profile.content1: PT. Jaya Karya Kontruksi is a construction company dedicated to providing the best infrastructure solutions in Indonesia. Founded with a vision to be a leader in the construction industry, we focus on quality, innovation, and sustainability.
profile.content2: With years of experience in managing large-scale projects, we have built a strong reputation in General Contractor, Batching Plant, and Asphalt Mixing Plant services.

history.title: Brief History
history.desc: Our journey began from a determination to contribute to regional development until now reaching national strategic projects.

0.event: Established as a small CV in the field of civil works.

1.event: Transformed into a PT and expanded into concrete material procurement services.

2.event: Inaugurated the first modern high-capacity Batching Plant unit.

3.event: Acquired the latest Asphalt Mixing Plant unit to support road paving projects.

vision.title: Vision & Mission
vision.vision_content: To be a leading construction and concrete/asphalt manufacturing company in Indonesia that prioritizes quality, speed, and customer satisfaction through technological innovation.

mission_items.0: Provide high-quality construction services with international standards.
mission_items.1: Provide the best concrete and asphalt materials to support national infrastructure.
mission_items.2: Increase human resource competency and utilize the latest technology.
mission_items.3: Committed to work safety and environmental sustainability.

values.title: Company Values
values.subtitle: The main pillars of success for PT. Jaya Karya Kontruksi

0.title: Integrity
0.desc: We uphold honesty and professional ethics in every aspect of our business.

1.title: Quality
1.desc: Delivering work results that exceed industry standards is our unwavering commitment.

2.title: Cooperation
2.desc: We believe that the power of team synergy and strategic partnerships is the key to success.

structure.title: Organization Structure
structure.p1: Our organization is professionally managed with clear division of duties to ensure efficiency in every project operation.

services.description: We provide various high-quality construction services

contractor.page_desc: Trusted general contractor for building, infrastructure, and road construction with the highest safety and quality standards.

batching.title: Batching Plant
batching.desc: Ready mix concrete production with modern Dry Mix systems and equipped with a Concrete Laboratory.
batching.page_desc: High-quality ready-mix concrete services for your construction needs.

strengths.0: Guaranteed concrete quality according to SNI standards
strengths.3: Supported by a sufficient fleet of mixer trucks

asphalt.title: Asphalt Mixing Plant
asphalt.desc: Quality hotmix asphalt production for road paving projects.
asphalt.page_desc: High-quality hotmix asphalt production for road and infrastructure development.
asphalt.content: We provide various types of asphalt mixtures such as AC-WC, AC-BC, AC-Base, and HRS with the best quality. Supported by the latest technology equipment and an experienced team of experts to ensure every product meets road technical standards.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Ready to help realize your construction project. Contact us for a free consultation.
